itinerary_summary: Explore the iconic attractions of San Francisco and near Rome, embracing unique experiences in nature and wildlife, while enjoying rich cultural history over an eight-day journey with friends.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Arrival and first exploration of San Francisco, focusing on famous waterfront attractions.

activities.activity_name: Visit Fisherman's Wharf, San Francisco
activities.description: Explore the lively waterfront area with shops, restaurants, and sea lions.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Boudin Bakery, San Francisco
activities.description: Enjoy a famous clam chowder in a sourdough bread bowl at this historic bakery.

activities.activity_name: Walk across Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco
activities.description: Experience breathtaking views of the bay and the city while walking along this iconic bridge.

activities.activity_name: Sunset at Crissy Field, San Francisco
activities.description: Relax and enjoy a beautiful sunset with a beach view of the Golden Gate Bridge.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Explore the stunning natural beauty of San Francisco and its wildlife parks.

activities.activity_name: Visit Golden Gate Park, San Francisco
activities.description: Discover the expansive park featuring gardens, lakes, and numerous trails.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Park Chalet, San Francisco
activities.description: Enjoy local cuisine with views of Golden Gate Park.

activities.activity_name: Explore the California Academy of Sciences, San Francisco
activities.description: Experience the aquarium, planetarium, and natural history museum all in one.

activities.activity_name: Visit the Japanese Tea Garden, San Francisco
activities.description: Wander through this serene garden and enjoy a traditional Japanese tea.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Explore the wildlife of San Francisco, promoting awareness for conservation.

activities.activity_name: Visit the San Francisco Zoo, San Francisco
activities.description: See an array of animals and learn about wildlife conservation.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Beach Chalet Restaurant, San Francisco
activities.description: Enjoy a meal with a view overlooking the Pacific Ocean.

activities.activity_name: Explore Ocean Beach, San Francisco
activities.description: Take a scenic stroll along the beach, keeping an eye out for local wildlife.

activities.activity_name: Enjoy a bonfire at Ocean Beach, San Francisco
activities.description: Gather around a bonfire at sunset, enjoying the warm ambiance.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Travel day to Italy, arriving in Rome to enjoy the local culture.

activities.activity_name: Flight to Rome, Italy
activities.description: Depart from San Francisco to Rome.

activities.activity_name: Dinner at Trattoria Da Carloni, Rome
activities.description: Savor traditional Roman cuisine.

activities.activity_name: Night walk at Villa Borghese Gardens, Rome
activities.description: Stroll through one of Rome's most beautiful parks.

activities.activity_name: Check into Hotel in Rome
activities.description: Settle in and prepare for the days of exploration.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Discover historical landmarks and cultural sites in Rome.

activities.activity_name: Visit Colosseum, Rome
activities.description: Explore the iconic amphitheater and learn about its history.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Ristorante Aroma, Rome
activities.description: Enjoy Italian cuisine with spectacular views of the Colosseum.

activities.activity_name: Visit Roman Forum, Rome
activities.description: Wander through the ruins of ancient Rome, soaking in the history.

activities.activity_name: Visit Chiesa di Gesù e Maria, Rome
activities.description: Explore this beautiful church known for its stunning architecture.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Visit Vatican City and enjoy the festive spirit of Rome during Christmas Eve.

activities.activity_name: Visit St. Peter's Basilica, Vatican City
activities.description: Marvel at the breathtaking architecture and interior of this magnificent basilica.

activities.activity_name: Explore Vatican Museums, Vatican City
activities.description: Discover masterpieces and artifacts spanning centuries.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at Ristorante dei Musei, Vatican City
activities.description: Delight in Italian dishes near the Vatican.

activities.activity_name: Attend Christmas Eve Mass, Vatican City
activities.description: Experience the joyous Christmas service in one of the world's most iconic churches.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Enjoy a leisurely Christmas Day exploring Rome's beautiful sites.

activities.activity_name: Visit Piazza Navona, Rome
activities.description: Admire the festive decorations and beautiful fountains.

activities.activity_name: Christmas Lunch at Ristorante Da Francesco, Rome
activities.description: Enjoy a festive meal in the heart of Rome.

activities.activity_name: Visit the Trevi Fountain, Rome
activities.description: Throw a coin in the fountain and make a wish!

activities.activity_name: Evening stroll through Trastevere, Rome
activities.description: Wander the charming, cobblestone streets and experience local Christmas joy.

day_by_day_itineraries.summary: Departure day with memories made exploring historic sites and nature.

activities.activity_name: Visit Spanish Steps, Rome
activities.description: Climb the famous steps and enjoy the view.

activities.activity_name: Last-minute shopping at Via del Corso, Rome
activities.description: Shop for souvenirs and mementos.

activities.activity_name: Lunch at L'Arcangelo, Rome
activities.description: Enjoy authentic Italian cuisine one last time.

activities.activity_name: Departure for Home
activities.description: Check out and head to the airport for your flight back home.
